full_summary:
# Tender Announcement:

## Title
EF945-241551 - Aerial Photography Services for Infrastructure Development

## Reference Information
Reference Number: WS4444314479-Doc4601387157
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: WS4444314479

## Publication and Tender Closing Dates
Publication Date: May 23, 2024
Tender Closing Date: June 11, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time

## Expiration Status
This tender has expired.

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Infrastructure Canada, issues this Request for Proposal (RFP) to obtain aerial photography services for infrastructure development projects in Quebec City and Lévis. The services will be used in preparation for the transfer of the Quebec Bridge from Canadian National (CN) to His Majesty the King in right of Canada.

## Classification
UNSPC Code: 82131601 (Aerial photography services)

## Eligibility Criteria
All requests for proposals must be submitted in writing and in accordance with the requirements specified on the solicitation document. All respondents must have the necessary qualifications and experience to complete the services as specified in the RFP.

## Contractual Terms
The selection criteria for this tender is price. The successful bidder will be required to demonstrate their ability to deliver the services as specified in the RFP.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers in Canada, subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

## Regions of Opportunity
This tender is open to suppliers in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Regions of Delivery
The aerial photography services will be delivered in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Contract Contact Information
Minister of Public Works and Government Services
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Isabelle Girard (SPAC/PSPC)
isabelle.girard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Further Information
More information about this tender can be found on the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19799334. Note: This tender is no longer available for bidding, as the closing date has expired.  #TABLEOFCONTENTS
